metadata.title: CVE-2016-10255 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The __libelf_set_rawdata_wrlock function in elf_getdata.c in elfutils before 0.168 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted (1) sh_off or (2) sh_size ELF header value, which triggers a memory allocation failure.

criterions.comment: elfutils package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.168-0.2').
